facet_1.name: Chicken Fingers
facet_1.effects: Applies Hex on the attacked enemy unit upon the Shaman's successful attack.

facet_2.name: Massive Serpent Ward
facet_2.effects: Summons a single, massive Serpent Ward with various increased traits to attack enemy units and enemy buildings. x10 Ward Trait Factor, x12 Damage Factor

effects: Enable cast on allies but doesn't disable them
Periodically releases Ether Shock of the corresponding level centered on the target unit that deals damage to other enemy units
Additionally spawns a flock of uncontrollable chicken images with pseudo-random behavior
Makes Shadow Shaman invulnerable during the illusion spawn

abilities.name: Fowl Play
abilities.description: Applies Hex on himself, without the set movement speed component, whenever Shadow Shaman takes lethal damage.
abilities.details: Has precedence over reincarnation sources. Prevents all incoming damage utilizing damage manipulation. Resets the ability's cooldown upon Rhasta's death, including Reincarnation sources.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: Rhasta's hero model has the following hidden innate abilities. He may only perform or utilize the ability's functions upon a successful channeling.
abilities.details: Contains hidden innate abilities that require channeling to activate.

ability_1.name: Ether Shock
ability_1.cast_radius: First Radius: 200, Max Distance: 600, End Radius: 300
ability_1.details: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.
ability_1.description: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.
technical_details: Affects units up to 1100-distance away in front of Rhasta's facing angle
Affects enemy units closest to the primary enemy unit within the area-of-effect
interaction_notes: All ability effects are nullified upon a Spell Block proc on the primary target

ability_2.name: Hex
ability_2.details: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
ability_2.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
technical_details: Instantly destroy imperfect, impaired, and inferior copies of heroes
interaction_notes: Applies Silence, Mute, Disarm, and Break
Changes selection box depending on Hex model

ability_3.name: Shackles
ability_3.details: Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, dealing damage over time.
ability_3.description: Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, dealing damage over time.
technical_details: Heals Rhasta over time during channeling
interaction_notes: Applies Stun and grants True Sight over target
Deals magical spell damage at 0.1-second intervals
Channeling interrupted by Hidden or Invulnerable sources on target

ability_4.name: Mass Serpent Ward
ability_4.details: Summons a number of Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and enemy buildings.
ability_4.description: Summons a number of Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and enemy buildings.

facet_effects.massive_serpent_ward: Summons a single, massive Serpent Ward with 10x Ward Trait Factor and 12x Damage Factor

interaction_notes: Creates ward-type units in ring formation
Wards have lower auto-attack priority than heroes
Deals physical spell damage per attack
Talent upgrade adds instant attack on additional target

changes: Reduced Ether Shock damage from 140/200/260/320 to 125/190/255/320
Increased Massive Serpent Ward damage factor from 10 to 12
Serpent Ward now prioritize the closest enemy hero within its attack range
REWORKED Aghanim's Scepter upgrade for Shackles
REWORKED Aghanim's Shard upgrade for Fowl Play
Updated talents: LVL 25 +20% Serpent Ward attack damage â†’ +1 Serpent Ward attack target
